query:
SELECT pt.id, pt.customerId, pt.txid, pt.endToEndId, pt.amount, pt.paidAt, pt.createdAt, c.name, c.pin
FROM pixTransactions pt
LEFT JOIN customers c ON pt.customerId = c.id
WHERE pt.txid = 'f76786d04e5d44508fd50305c8a062ee' OR pt.customerId IN (
  SELECT customerId FROM recharges WHERE id = 600001
)
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
